node.title: Calvi Bandeau Top Reversible - Black
node.description: The Calvi Bandeau Top can basically be worn in and out of the ocean. On the beach with your favorite leggings for a yoga session or combined with a nice pair of jeans shorts to get those eyes rolling. If you thought a bandeau top couldn’t give you enough support, no worries ladies! we designed this piece with a supportive bust band and added straps for a little extra support to manage all bust sizes. It's a real allrounder and suitable for running, surf.. and all other activities you want to do on your next journey. Don't forget it's reversible - switching color whenever you feel like! With this product, you only buy the top.

node.title: Copy of Woodlike Ocean - Gift Card  € 100,00  (print version)
node.description: Give the thoughtful gift of choice with one of our Woodlike Ocean gift cards. That way your beloved ones can choose their favorite piece and size! Your gift card will be sent to you by email with a code for redemption. The card can be printed out or forwarded on to your special someone. The Gift Card is valid indefinitely.

node.title: Coral Bustier Top - Black
node.description: Innovative yet sophisticated is the cheeky and sporty design of the cut-out bustier top. This versatile bikini top is born from the ocean and designed for an environmentally conscious woman who loves to integrate the ocean into her life. With the Coral, you can do pretty much anything you can imagine; a sunset surf session, yoga at the beach or dancing throughout the night. The Underbust band will give you enough support and a little extra lift, while the wide shoulder straps will make sure nothing is cutting in. We are calling it "Sports-luxe meets femme-silhouette!"

You name it, flowing gracefully through those yoga poses, running your heart out or just lounging at the beach club. The two soft straps are weightless and sit relaxed on your shoulders. It is so comfortable you’ll never want to take it off! Mix and match it with any of our bikini bottoms. You buy the top only.

node.description: The Sundance triangle pants rise from the bottom of the ocean for you to enjoy a perfect tan. And when we say from the bottom of the ocean, we mean it literally; crafted from reclaimed fishing nets and other recycled material. A seamless fit for you to slip in and look gorgeous. Reversible bikini bottoms ready to match your day mood. Providing enough coverage for you to feel comfortable at all times. A must have in every environmental conscious wardrobe. Mix and match it with any of our bikini tops.

node.title: Wild Fox Bustier Reversible Berry
node.description: The ocean has so many hidden treasures waiting for you; like this bustier bikini top literally crafted from reclaimed fishing nets and other recycled materials. Versatile, sophisticated and environmentally conscious, a piece that will never let you down. Pair it with an airy tank top or a blouse and be ready to look gorgeous. Yoga, beach volleyball or stand up paddling? Our bustier bikini top will perform in any of your favorite sports activities. And of course, ideal if you just want to hang out at the beach and look fantastic. Be proud, with this piece you just helped creating a healthy ocean. Mix and match it with any of our bikini bottoms.

node.title: Wild Fox Bustier Top

node.title: Woodlike Ocean - Gift Card  € 100,00  (postcard)
node.description: Give the thoughtful gift of choice with one of our Woodlike Ocean gift cards. That way your beloved ones can choose their favorite piece and size! Your gift card will be sent to you by email with a code for redemption. The card can be printed out or forwarded on to your special someone. The Gift Card is valid indefinitely.
